column4: could you please stop sending me links to the wiki frontpage?!
i allready installed the libdvdcss2 package
the dvd is simply not recognized by my OS
first i tried it with "sudo /usr/share/doc/libdvdread4/install-css.sh"... Then i tried "apt-get install libdvdcss2"
i think they are not the problem, because the dvd playes a few seconds every 20th time i insert the disc.
did you ever add the medibuntu repo as the page says to do
that page will help you add the repo and the key and everything else needed for your issue
Go through that page.  it WILL fix your problem
and exactly how did you add the dvdcs2
Pastebin your sources list to be sure
Which version and where you got it will greatly determine how well it all wortks
We understand what YOU think it is, try working with people and answering the questions or doing the things we tell or suggest
